content: having toasty warm hands coldmetalmitts_v1 0 ©barbelle 2025 this pattern and included photos are intended for personal use only pattern and items made from pattern may not be sold or distributed 9 about the designer hi my name is trish hernacki i m an optometrist and occasional knitwear designer i live in helena montana with my three dogs bruce teddy and jack if i m not examining patients or knitting you can find me lifting weights or running trails if you have any questions/comments please contact me email barbellecreates@gmail com instagram @barbellecreates ravelry barbellecreates thank you if you share your knitting on instagram please use the hashtag #coldmetalmitts and tag me @barbellecreates so i can see your beautiful work technical editing by marie ferner coldmetalmitts_v1 0 ©barbelle 2025 this pattern and included photos are intended for personal use only pattern and items made from pattern may not be sold or distributed
